meanings.definition: Polite and refined in manner or appearance.
meanings.sent1: She always displayed genteelness in her interactions with others.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of genteelness, with everyone dressed elegantly.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the genteelness of the queen by sitting with its paws crossed.
meanings.sent4: The old mansion exuded an air of genteelness, as if it held secrets of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: Her genteelness shone through in the way she delicately sipped her tea.

meanings.definition: The quality of being well-bred or refined.
meanings.sent1: His genteelness was evident in the way he carried himself with grace.
meanings.sent2: The genteelness of the aristocratic family was admired by all in the town.
meanings.sent3: The dog's attempt at genteelness was ruined when it chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The garden party was a display of genteelness, with guests conversing in hushed tones.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of genteelness in the noblewoman's posture.
